If you have a device within Homey that's only partially working in another Matter controller such as Apple Home, please embed the device's JSON in your issue.

**Device JSON**

```json
Replace this section. To get your device's JSON, visit https://my.homey.app, right-click the device and  while holding [Alt] or [‚å•], click **Copy JSON**. Then paste over this instruction.
```
